items.title: The Menu
items.plot: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.
items.stars: Ralph Fiennes, Anya Taylor-Joy, Nicholas Hoult, Hong Chau

items.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
items.plot: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
items.stars: Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Winston Duke

items.title: Spirited
items.plot: A musical version of Charles Dickens's story of a miserly misanthrope who is taken on a magical journey.
items.stars: Will Ferrell, Ryan Reynolds, Octavia Spencer, Patrick Page

items.title: Violent Night
items.plot: When a group of mercenaries attack the estate of a wealthy family, Santa Claus must step in to save the day (and Christmas).
items.stars: David Harbour, John Leguizamo, Alex Hassell, Alexis Louder

items.title: Strange World
items.plot: The legendary Clades are a family of explorers whose differences threaten to topple their latest and most crucial mission.
items.stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Jaboukie Young-White, Gabrielle Union, Dennis Quaid

items.title: Bones and All
items.plot: Maren, a young woman, learns how to survive on the margins of society.
items.stars: Timothée Chalamet, Taylor Russell, Mark Rylance, Kendle Coffey

items.title: Black Adam
items.plot: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.
items.stars: Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge, Pierce Brosnan, Noah Centineo

items.title: Love Actually
items.plot: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.
items.stars: Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Liam Neeson, Laura Linney

items.title: The Fabelmans
items.plot: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.
items.stars: Michelle Williams, Gabriel LaBelle, Paul Dano, Judd Hirsch

items.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
items.plot: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.
items.stars: Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Juliette Lewis, Johnny Galecki

items.title: Home Alone
items.plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.
items.stars: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard

items.title: Top Gun: Maverick
items.plot: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.
items.stars: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer

items.title: Bhediya
items.plot: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.
items.stars: Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon, Abhishek Banerjee, Deepak Dobriyal

items.title: Devotion (II)
items.plot: A pair of U.S. Navy fighter pilots risk their lives during the Korean War and become some of the Navy's most celebrated wingmen.
items.stars: Jonathan Majors, Glen Powell, Christina Jackson, Thomas Sadoski

items.title: Elf
items.plot: Raised as an oversized elf, Buddy travels from the North Pole to New York City to meet his biological father, Walter Hobbs, who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.
items.stars: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Zooey Deschanel

items.title: She Said
items.plot: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation - a story that helped ignite a movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.
items.stars: Carey Mulligan, Zoe Kazan, Patricia Clarkson, Andre Braugher

items.title: The Mean One
items.plot: The Mean One is a Christmas horror parody. In a sleepy mountain town, Cindy has her parents murdered and her Christmas stolen by a blood thirsty green figure in a red Santa suit - The Mean ... See full summary
items.stars: Josh Arnold, Erik Baker, Stephanie Bates, John Bigham

items.title: Emancipation
items.plot: A runaway slave forges through the swamps of Louisiana on a tortuous journey to escape plantation owners that nearly killed him.
items.stars: Will Smith, Ben Foster, Charmaine Bingwa, Gilbert Owuor

items.title: Drishyam 2
items.plot: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?
items.stars: Ajay Devgn, Tabu, Akshaye Khanna, Shriya Saran

items.title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
items.plot: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.
items.stars: Ewan McGregor, David Bradley, Gregory Mann, Burn Gorman

items.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
items.plot: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.
items.stars: Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Kerry Condon, Barry Keoghan

items.title: Tár
items.plot: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and first-ever female music director of a major German orchestra.
items.stars: Cate Blanchett, Noémie Merlant, Nina Hoss, Sophie Kauer

items.title: The Woman King
items.plot: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.
items.stars: Viola Davis, Thuso Mbedu, Lashana Lynch, Sheila Atim

items.title: White Noise (I)
items.plot: Dramatizes a contemporary American family's attempts to deal with the mundane conflicts of everyday life while grappling with the universal mysteries of love, death, and the possibility of happiness in an uncertain world.
items.stars: Adam Driver, Greta Gerwig, Don Cheadle, Madison Gaughan

items.title: The Grinch
items.plot: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.
items.stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Cameron Seely, Rashida Jones, Pharrell Williams

items.title: Ticket to Paradise
items.plot: A divorced couple teams up and travels to Bali to stop their daughter from making the same mistake they think they made 25 years ago.
items.stars: George Clooney, Sean Lynch, Julia Roberts, Arielle Carver-O'Neill

items.title: Armageddon Time
items.plot: A deeply personal coming-of-age story about the strength of family and the generational pursuit of the American Dream.
items.stars: Anne Hathaway, Jeremy Strong, Banks Repeta, Jaylin Webb

items.title: The Polar Express
items.plot: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.
items.stars: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter, Leslie Zemeckis

items.title: Aftersun (II)
items.plot: Sophie reflects on the shared joy and private melancholy of a holiday she took with her father twenty years earlier. Memories real and imagined fill the gaps between as she tries to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't.
items.stars: Paul Mescal, Frankie Corio, Celia Rowlson-Hall, Sally Messham

items.title: Spoiler Alert (II)
items.plot: The story of Michael Ausiello and Kit Cowan's relationship that takes a tragic turn when Cowan is diagnosed with terminal cancer.
items.stars: Jim Parsons, Ben Aldridge, Josh Pais, Allegra Heart

items.title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile
items.plot: Feature film based on the children's book about a crocodile that lives in New York City.
items.stars: Javier Bardem, Winslow Fegley, Shawn Mendes, Constance Wu

items.title: It's a Wonderful Life
items.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.
items.stars: James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell

items.title: An Action Hero
items.plot: Youth Icon. Superstar. Action Hero. At the age of just 30, Maanav was at the peak of his career when he got caught up in an accident while filming in Haryana. Maanav, who was once a household name, is now living in hiding.
items.stars: Akshay Kumar, Ayushmann Khurrana, Nora Fatehi, Mirabel Stuart

items.title: Empire of Light
items.plot: A drama about the power of human connection during turbulent times, set in an English coastal town in the early 1980s.
items.stars: Olivia Colman, Micheal Ward, Colin Firth, Toby Jones

items.title: Holy Spider
items.plot: A journalist descends into the dark underbelly of the Iranian holy city of Mashhad as she investigates the serial killings of sex workers by the so called "Spider Killer", who believes he is cleansing the streets of sinners.
items.stars: Mehdi Bajestani, Zar Amir-Ebrahimi, Arash Ashtiani, Forouzan Jamshidnejad

items.title: I Heard the Bells
items.plot: The inspiring story behind the writing of the beloved Christmas carol and its author, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow.
items.stars: Stephen Atherholt, Jonathan Blair, Rachel Day Hughes, Zach Meeker

items.title: Father Stu
items.plot: Follows the life of Father Stuart Long, a boxer-turned-priest who inspired countless people during his journey from self-destruction to redemption.
items.stars: Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson, Jacki Weaver, Teresa Ruiz

items.title: Prey for the Devil
items.plot: A nun prepares to perform an exorcism and comes face to face with a demonic force with mysterious ties to her past.
items.stars: Virginia Madsen, Cora Kirk, Jacqueline Byers, Colin Salmon

items.title: In Bruges
items.plot: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.
items.stars: Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Ciarán Hinds, Elizabeth Berrington

items.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
items.plot: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.
items.stars: Michael Caine, Dave Goelz, Steve Whitmire, Jerry Nelson

items.title: The Inspection
items.plot: A young, gay Black man, rejected by his mother and with few options for his future, decides to join the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside.
items.stars: Jeremy Pope, Gabrielle Union, Bokeem Woodbine, Raúl Castillo

items.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
items.plot: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.
items.stars: Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon, Barry Bostwick, Richard O'Brien

items.title: The Eternal Daughter
items.plot: Returning to a hotel now haunted by its mysterious past, an artist and her elderly mother confront long-buried secrets in their former family home.
items.stars: Tilda Swinton, Carly-Sophia Davies, Zinnia Davies-Cooke, August Joshi

items.title: Christmas Bloody Christmas
items.plot: It's Christmas Eve and Tori just wants to get drunk and party, but when a robotic Santa Clause at a nearby toy store goes haywire and begins a rampant killing spree through her small town, she's forced into a battle for survival.
items.stars: Riley Dandy, Sam Delich, Jonah Ray, Dora Madison

items.title: HIT: The 2nd Case
items.plot: Krishna Dev aka KD, a laid back cop, works in AP HIT, has to take up a gruesome murder case. As KD unravels the layers of the crime, the stakes rise unbelievably high and the threat comes unusually close.
items.stars: Adivi Sesh, Vinni Mobstaz, Komalee Prasad, Meenakshii Chaudhary

items.title: All the Beauty and the Bloodshed
items.plot: Following the life of artist Nan Goldin and the downfall of the Sackler family, the pharmaceutical dynasty who was greatly responsible for the opioid epidemic's unfathomable death toll.
items.stars: Nan Goldin, David Armstrong, Marina Berio, Noemi Bonazzi
items.fullTitle: All the Beauty and the Bloodshed (2022)

items.title: The Best Man Holiday
items.plot: When college friends reunite after 15 years over the Christmas holidays, they discover just how easy it is for long-forgotten rivalries and romances to be reignited.
items.stars: Monica Calhoun, Morris Chestnut, Melissa De Sousa, Taye Diggs

items.title: The Quintessential Quintuplets Movie
items.plot: Teenage Tutor Fuutaro Uesugi has to finally choose between the 5 Nakano Sisters, who all have feelings for him, at the School's Upcoming Cultural Festival; the event that will lead to his Wedding to one of them in a Flash-Forward.
items.stars: Felecia Angelle, Bryn Apprill, Tia Lynn Ballard, Kamen Casey

items.title: Detective Knight: Redemption
items.plot: In custody in New York, Detective James Knight finds himself in the middle of a jailbreak led by The Christmas Bomber, a brutal fanatic whose Santa Claus disciples are terrorizing the city.... See full summary
items.stars: Bruce Willis, Corey Large, John Cassini, Miranda Edwards

items.title: Salaam Venky
items.plot: Sujata, an ideal mother, who battled the most challenging situations one can ever face with a smile.
items.stars: Aamir Khan, Kajol, Prakash Raj, Priyamani

items.title: The Sparring Partner
items.plot: Based on a shocking case in real life, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty to the crime, defense attorneys face each other as nine jurors grapple with the truth.
items.stars: Yeung Wai-lun, Pui Tung Mak, Louisa So, Jan Lamb

items.title: Snowman
items.plot: After Canadian police apprehend a man they believe to be a notorious serial killer, the wife of one of his victims plots her revenge.
items.stars: Neeru Bajwa, Arshi Khatkar, Jazzy B., Rana Ranbir

items.directors: Shin'ichirô Watanabe, Tensai Okamura, Hiroyuki Okiura, Yoshiyuki Takei
items.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
items.plot: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.
items.stars: Beau Billingslea, Melissa Fahn, Nicholas Guest, Kôichi Yamadera

items.title: 2nd Chance
items.plot: A documentary chronicling the life of Richard Davis, the man who invented the concealable bulletproof vest - shooting himself 196 times in the course of his career to prove the effectiveness of his vests.
items.stars: Richard Davis

items.title: Salvatore: Shoemaker of Dreams
items.plot: The life of Italian shoemaker Salvatore Ferragamo, who created shoes for Hollywood stars during the silent film era and for iconic films of the period.
items.stars: Salvatore Ferragamo, Michael Stuhlbarg, Manolo Blahnik, Grace Coddington

items.title: I Am DB Cooper
items.plot: Tells the story of hijacker DB Cooper, who remains one of the great PNW mysteries.
items.stars: Rainee Blake, Chris Bruno, Trevor Butcher, Joshua Chessin-Yudin

items.title: Vadh
items.plot: Story of an old married couple who were satisfied with their mundane middle class life, till their son decides to go for higher studies to USA.
items.stars: Neena Gupta, Umesh Kaushik, Diwakar Kumar, Tanya Lal

items.title: Divorce Bait
items.plot: Alexis Laguna is a happily re-married, suburban housewife. One day she announces that she is getting divorced just to see which of her friends will try to steal her husband. Meanwhile, an old flame comes back into her life.
items.stars: Vannessa Vasquez, Justin Berti, Erik Fellows, Jennifer Daley

items.title: National Theatre Live: Henry V
items.plot: Fresh to the throne, King Henry V launches England into a bloody war with France. When his campaign encounters resistance, this inexperienced new ruler must prove he is fit to guide a country into war.
items.stars: Kit Harington, Olivier Huband, Danny Kirrane

items.title: Subho Bijoya
items.plot: Subho Bijoya revolves around a Bonedi family situated in North Calcutta. An incident is forced to bring back the estranged family members back to the house. Relationships start to entwine.
items.stars: Anindya Chatterjee, Amrita De, Devtanu, Churni Ganguly

items.title: Naai Sekar Returns
items.plot: Petty criminal Naai Sekar kidnaps dogs belonging to the rich in order to collect a ransom, but makes a critical mistake when he abducts the dog of a ruthless gangster.
items.stars: Aarthi, Anandraj, Redin Kingsley, Sivaangi Krishnakumar

items.title: One Man Dies a Million Times
items.plot: A true story, set in the future. About seeds and genetic diversity, about growth and decay, about love and war, about hunger of all kinds. About what it means to be human, even when all your humanity is stripped away.
items.stars: Alyssa Lozovskaya, Maksim Blinov, Vladimir Koshevoy, Alena Artemova
items.fullTitle: One Man Dies a Million Times (2019)

items.title: Mukhachitram
items.plot: A plastic surgeon's life turns upside down after he replaces his wife's face to his ex-girlfriend. Things blow out unusually leading to a big issue ending in courtroom drama.
items.stars: Ayesha Khan, Chaitanya Rao, Ravishankar, Vishwak Sen
